content.question: Which of the following best describes a response by US political leaders to developments described in the source?

choices.label: State officials instituted an apprenticeship to gradually end the enslavement of Afro-descendants.
Congress passed the Emancipation Proclamation, which ended slavery in all United States territories.
Local leaders negotiated better labor conditions with enslaved populations.
Plans were developed to create a colony for the growing free Black population.

content.answer: Plans were developed to create a colony for the growing free Black population.
